body.p: Images must have text alternatives that describe the information or function represented by them.

section.title: Short Text Equivalents for Images
section.p: When using the image element, specify a short alternative text with the alt element.

section.title: Long Descriptions of Images
section.p: For complex images, when a short text equivalent does not suffice to adequately convey the function or role of an image, provide additional information in a file designated by the longdescref element.
